Serialized Form

  • Package edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Achievements extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -1109622401625934316L

      • Serialized Fields

        • normalLevelsCleared1

          boolean normalLevelsCleared1
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 1 normal level. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setNormalLevelsCleared1().

        • normalLevelsCleared10

          boolean normalLevelsCleared10
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 10 normal levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setNormalLevelsCleared10().

        • normalLevelsCleared50

          boolean normalLevelsCleared50
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 50 normal levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setNormalLevelsCleared50().

        • normalLevelsCleared100

          boolean normalLevelsCleared100
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 100 normal levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setNormalLevelsCleared100().

        • hardLevelsCleared1

          boolean hardLevelsCleared1
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 1 hard level. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setHardLevelsCleared1().

        • hardLevelsCleared10

          boolean hardLevelsCleared10
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 10 hard levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setHardLevelsCleared10().

        • hardLevelsCleared50

          boolean hardLevelsCleared50
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 50 hard levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setHardLevelsCleared50().

        • hardLevelsCleared100

          boolean hardLevelsCleared100
          This field represents the achievement of clearing 100 hard levels. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setHardLevelsCleared100().

        • roomsChecked1

          boolean roomsChecked1
          This field represents the achievement of checking 1 room in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setRoomsChecked1().

        • roomsChecked10

          boolean roomsChecked10
          This field represents the achievement of checking 10 rooms in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setRoomsChecked10().

        • roomsChecked50

          boolean roomsChecked50
          This field represents the achievement of checking 50 rooms in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setRoomsChecked50().

        • roomsChecked100

          boolean roomsChecked100
          This field represents the achievement of checking 100 rooms in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setRoomsChecked100().

        • itemsObtained1

          boolean itemsObtained1
          This field represents the achievement of obtaining 1 item in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setItemsObtained1().

        • itemsObtained10

          boolean itemsObtained10
          This field represents the achievement of obtaining 10 items in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setItemsObtained10().

        • itemsObtained50

          boolean itemsObtained50
          This field represents the achievement of obtaining 50 items in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setItemsObtained50().

        • itemsObtained100

          boolean itemsObtained100
          This field represents the achievement of obtaining 100 items in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setItemsObtained100().

        • enemiesKilled1

          boolean enemiesKilled1
          This field represents the achievement of killing 1 enemy in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setEnemiesKilled1().

        • enemiesKilled10

          boolean enemiesKilled10
          This field represents the achievement of killing 10 enemies in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setEnemiesKilled10().

        • enemiesKilled50

          boolean enemiesKilled50
          This field represents the achievement of killing 50 enemies in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setEnemiesKilled50().

        • enemiesKilled100

          boolean enemiesKilled100
          This field represents the achievement of killing 100 enemies in any game mode. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setEnemiesKilled100().

        • cheat

          boolean cheat
          This field represents the achievement of activating the cheat code. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Achievements.setCheat().

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Enemy extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      348594319363127580L

      • Serialized Fields

        • visible

          boolean visible
          This field represents whether the ninja is visible on the map. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can only be set to true with the method Enemy.setVisible() when the game is started in debug mode.

        • hasMoved

          boolean hasMoved
          This field represents whether the ninja has moved during the turn where each ninja is moved around. This field makes sure that each ninja only moves once per turn. This field is set to false when the class is initialized and can be set to true with the method Enemy.move() when the enemy has moved and false with the method Enemy.resetTurn() at the start of the enemies' turn.

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Highscore extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -5987175536086085428L

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          java.lang.String name
          This field represents the player's name associated with their Highscore.score. This field will be initialized in the constructor method, Highscore.Highscore(String, int) and can never be changed.

        • score

          int score
          This field represents the player's score associated with their Highscore.name. This field will be initialized in the constructor method, Highscore.Highscore(String, int) and can never be changed.

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Item extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -4810189815002025489L

      • Serialized Fields

        • type

          Item.itemType type
          This field represents the type of item the item actually is.

        • visible

          boolean visible
          This field represents whether the player can see the item.

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -4512803050114192493L

      • Serialized Fields

        • gameMap

          Entity[][] gameMap
          This field represents the game's map, and the locations of every entity within the game world.

        • rand

          java.util.Random rand
          This field represents the random number generator used in determining random outcomes.

        • previousPlayerRow

          int previousPlayerRow
          This field is used in keeping track of the player's row prior to moving. This field is used in order to replace the player back in their original position if the player is unable to move. In addition, this field is also partly used in determining the AI movement of the enemy in the method, Map.moveAI().

        • previousPlayerColumn

          int previousPlayerColumn
          This field is used in keeping track of the player's column prior to moving. This field is used in order to replace the player back in their original position if the player is unable to move. In addition, this field is also partly used in determining the AI movement of the enemy in the method, Map.moveAI().

        • playerRow

          int playerRow
          This field represents the player's current row. This field can be altered when the player moves through the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction) and is used to determine where the player is at all times. This is useful for when the player {Map.look(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction, int)s or Map.shoot(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction)s.

        • playerColumn

          int playerColumn
          This field represents the player's current column. This field can be altered when the player moves through the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction) and is used to determine where the player is at all times. This is useful for when the player {Map.look(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction, int)s or Map.shoot(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction)s.

        • lastItem

          Item.itemType lastItem
          This field represents the type of the last item that the player picked up. If this field is not null, then the item will be resolved by the method, Map.resolveItem(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Item.itemType), and be reset to null by the method, Map.resetLastItem().

        • turnsInvincible

          int turnsInvincible
          This field represents the number of turns the player has remaining to be invincible. This item is set to a value of 6 in the method, Map.resolveItem(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Item.itemType), when the player picks up an invincibility item. This value is automatically reduced on the first turn, ensuring that the player only has 5 turns of invincibility. Then, the value of this field will be reduced once every turn. While this field contains a value greater than 0, the method, {Map.enemyScan(), will not be called, giving the player a "pseudo invincibility".

        • debug

          boolean debug
          This field represents whether or not the game is in "debug mode". This field is initialized when a game is first initialized by the GameEngine through the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int)} and can never be altered.

        • hardMode

          boolean hardMode
          This field represents whether or not the game is in "hard mode". This field is initialized when a game is first initialized by the GameEngine through the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int)} and can never be altered.

        • godMode

          boolean godMode
          This field represents whether or not the game is in "God mode". This field is initialized when a game is first initialized by the GameEngine through the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int)} and can never be altered.

        • level

          int level
          This field represents the current level the player is on. This field is initialized to 1 when a game is first initialized by the GameEngine through the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int) and is increased in increments of 1 when the method, Map.nextLevel(int), is called.

        • numOfTurns

          int numOfTurns
          This field represents the number of turns the player has taken on the specific level that the player is currently on. This field is only increased after the player moves through the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction)}.

        • totalNumOfTurns

          int totalNumOfTurns
          This field represents the total number of turns the player has taken prior to the current level. The field Map.numOfTurns is only added to this field when the player decides to move onto the next level by calling the method, Map.nextLevel(int).

        • roomsChecked

          int roomsChecked
          This field represents the number of rooms the player has checked on the specific level that the player is currently on. This field is only increased when the player checks a room in the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction).

        • totalRoomsChecked

          int totalRoomsChecked
          This field represents the total number of rooms the player has checked prior to the current level. The field Map.roomsChecked is only added to this field when the player decides to move onto the next level by calling the method, Map.nextLevel(int).

        • itemPickups

          int itemPickups
          This field represents the number of items the player has obtained on the specific level that the player is currently on. This field is only increased when the player obtains an item in the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction).

        • totalItemPickups

          int totalItemPickups
          This field represents the total number of items the player has obtained prior to the current level. The field Map.itemPickups is only added to this field when the player decides to move onto the next level by calling the method, Map.nextLevel(int).

        • enemiesKilled

          int enemiesKilled
          This field represents the number of enemies the player has killed on the specific level that the player is currently on. This field is only increased when the player kills an enemy in the method, Map.shoot(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction).

        • totalEnemiesKilled

          int totalEnemiesKilled
          This field represents the total number of enemies the player has killed prior to the current level. The field Map.enemiesKilled is only added to this field when the player decides to move onto the next level by calling the method, Map.nextLevel(int).

        • score

          int score
          This field represents the player's current score. This field is first initialized as 0 in the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int) and is only updated when the Map.tallyScore(boolean) method is called based on the different circumstances.

        • modeMultiplier

          double modeMultiplier
          This field represents the score multiplier associated with each mode. This field is initialized in the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int), based on the mode that the player is playing in and can never be changed.

        • levelMultiplier

          double levelMultiplier
          This field represents the score multiplier associated with the current level. This field is initialized as 1 in the method, Map.initialize(boolean, boolean, boolean, int), and is increased by 0.5 for each level after level 1 through the method, Map.nextLevel(int).

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Player extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -5544078866457060595L

      • Serialized Fields

        • lives

          int lives
          This field represents the number of lives the player has remaining.

        • ammo

          int ammo
          This field represents the player's current ammo. This field can be altered by the method Player.shoot() and Player.reload() and is set with the constructor method, Player.Player(int).

        • maxAmmo

          int maxAmmo
          This field represents the number of bullets the player can hold. This field is initialized in the constructor method, Player.Player(int), through the method Player.setMaxAmmo(int).

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Record extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -5542581930624597294L

      • Serialized Fields

        • highestLevelNormal

          int highestLevelNormal
          This field records the highest level reached in normal game mode in a single gameplay.

        • highestLevelHard

          int highestLevelHard
          This field records the highest level reached in hard game mode in a single gameplay.

        • livesRemaining

          int livesRemaining
          This field records the highest remaining player lives in any game mode in a single gameplay.

        • turnsSurvived

          int turnsSurvived
          This field records the highest number of turns survived in any game mode in a single gameplay.

        • roomsChecked

          int roomsChecked
          This field records the highest number of rooms checked in any game mode in a single gameplay.

        • itemsObtained

          int itemsObtained
          This field records the highest number of items obtained in any game mode in a single gameplay.

        • enemiesKilled

          int enemiesKilled
          This field records the highest number of enemies killed in any game mode in a single gameplay.

        • totalLevelNormal

          int totalLevelNormal
          This field records the accumulative number of levels cleared in normal game mode.

        • totalLevelHard

          int totalLevelHard
          This field records the accumulative number of levels cleared in hard game mode.

        • totalRoomsChecked

          int totalRoomsChecked
          This field records the accumulative number of rooms checked in any game mode.

        • totalItemsObtained

          int totalItemsObtained
          This field records the accumulative number of items obtained in any game mode.

        • totalEnemiesKilled

          int totalEnemiesKilled
          This field records the accumulative number of enemies killed in any game mode.

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Room extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      8900547777889141681L

      • Serialized Fields

        • hasBriefcase

          boolean hasBriefcase
          This field represents whether the room contains the briefcase. Set to false during constructor and given using Room.placeBriefcase().

        • checked

          boolean checked
          This field represents whether or not the player has checked the room. Set to false during constructor and Room.check().

        • visible

          boolean visible
          This field represents whether the player can see the briefcase (if it is contained in this room)

    • Class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Shop extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -1270016899582463609L

      • Serialized Fields

        • money

          int money
          This field represents the money the player currently has. This field can be reduced when items are bought through the methods, Shop.buyHealth(), Shop.buyMagazine(), Shop.buyVision(), and Shop.buyGodMode(), and increased when achievements are obtained through the method, Shop.addMoney(int).

        • vision

          int vision
          This field represents the player's current night vision goggles's level. This field dictates how far the player can see using the Map.look(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction, int) method.

        • magazine

          int magazine
          This field represents the player's current magazine level. This field dictates the amount of ammo the player can hold and is used to set the player's max ammo using the Map.setMaxAmmo(int) method.

        • health

          int health
          This field represents the player's current health level. This field dictates how much health the player gets when moving onto the next level and is used in the Map.nextLevel(int) method.

        • visionCost

          int visionCost
          This field represents how much the vision upgrade currently costs. Every time an upgrade is bought the price is increased in the method, Shop.buyVision(). Once the highest upgrade is bought, this field will be set to 0.

        • magazineCost

          int magazineCost
          This field represents how much the magazine upgrade currently costs. Every time an upgrade is bought the price is increased in the method, Shop.buyMagazine(). Once the highest upgrade is bought, this field will be set to 0.

        • healthCost

          int healthCost
          This field represents how much the health upgrade currently costs. Every time an upgrade is bought the price is increased in the method, Shop.buyHealth(). Once the highest upgrade is bought, this field will be set to 0.

        • godMode

          boolean godMode
          This field represents whether or not the player has obtained God mode or not. When God mode is obtained, the player can play in this new game mode.
